about_the_game:
Venture Through and Make Your Mark


The Blood of Yamin is a metroidvania RPG set in a world where man has just learned to harvest the essence of a dead god. Explore, collect, and slay your way across Yamin from a side-scrolling perspective. Along your journey, you'll brave the wilderness which is packed to the brim with outlaws and monsters. You'll explore dense cities to shop, gather information, and begin quests to prepare for that expedition to the wilds. You'll learn new abilities to unlock dangerous areas and overcome the enemies that await you there.

Join one of three influential guilds and leave your mark for whatever cause you deem worthy. Uncover the mystery of Roshee, a god all but forgotten, and learn of the dangers lurking beneath the world's surface. And when you're ready, brave the depths below for demanding, high-end content that will push your skills and preparation to its absolute limit.



Game Features

  • Converse with colorful characters
  • Experiment with different weapons and spells
  • Unlock mobility skills to further exploration and uncover secrets
  • Utilize powerful combat abilities to decimate enemies
  • Build a unique character through a variety of stats and abilities
  • Navigate dangerous environmental hazards
  • Solve complex environmental puzzles
  • Craft helpful gear and nourishing meals to aid in adventuring
  • Loot equipment and gather components for crafting
  • Employ fast travel to zip around the map and ease back tracking pains
  • Explore a vibrant world featuring mystical forests, sprawling cities, and the harrowing depths

short_description: Blood of Yamin is a stylish metroidvania RPG where you can forge your own playstyle. Powered by the essence of a dead god, explore a gorgeous 2D world on the cusp of the industrial revolution, conquer powerful foes, and confront the unknown horrors lurking beneath the surface.
